title: Hermes International 3Q Revenue Rose 18%
text:
By Pietro Lombardi

Hermes International SCA (RMS.FR) said Thursday that its third-quarter revenue rose, supported by a positive performance across regions.

Revenue for the period grew 18% to 1.73 billion euros ($1.92 billion), the French luxury-goods company said. The company posted a positive performance in all geographies. Revenue grew 25% in Asia and 15% in the Americas region.

The company, best known for its leather bags, backed its medium-term outlook of revenue growth at constant exchange rates.
